body:
Note that for tensor construction, you can do something like
```python
tensor_type = torch.cuda.FloatTensor

my_tensor = tensor_type(2, 3)
my_tensor2 = torch.rand(2).type(tensor_type)
```

but having the `dtype` argument will be much better.
